content:
Bhoothatthaal en makallettam-kandaalum! Kleshikkunnu;
Sangkadamodu kanaanyasthree-kartthan pakkal chonnevam.
Aa vishvaasam vijayichu-thal sutha saukhyam praapichu.
Mrthyupedum martthyanmaarkk-vyaadhiyumaadhiyumaattaanaayu
Anpezhumaathmajane vitton-anpudayonthaathan sthuthyan
Puthraathmaakkall poojyanmaar-nammude mel krpayeratte.
